shortContent:
The character may make
an additional Dodge once per Round.
content:
The character can sway his body out of the path of an attack,
causing it to pass through thin air. The character may make
an additional Dodge once per Round. In effect, this gives the
character a second Reaction that may only be used to Dodge,
allowing two Dodges in a Turn. However, the character may
still only attempt a single Dodge against one attack.
